name: Canvas Component Delete

movements.name: Delete

beats.title: Delete Component
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want deleteComponent to execute reliably with latency < 100ms so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: publishes canvas.component.created with id + correlationId when both present (createdNode path)

then: component is removed atomically and references are cleaned; ≤ 50ms

beats.title: Publish Deleted
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want publishDeleted to execute reliably with latency < 1 minute so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: publishes canvas.component.selection.changed when publishSelectionChanged handler is called

then: a 'component.deleted' event publishes with id and parent

movements.userStory: As an operator, I need the delete symphony to remove components safely, validating references and emitting audit trails in ≤1s P95 per beat, ensuring no orphaned links remain.
movements.businessValue: Enables data cleanup workflows; prevents data bloat; improves storage efficiency by 30%; supports compliance (data retention)
